GPMC Hardware attributes.

Field Documentation

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::addrDataMux

address and data multiplexed protocol

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::chipSel

Signals timing latencies scalar factor

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::chipSelAddrSize

Chip select address mask size

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::chipSelBaseAddr

Chip select base address (A29 - A24)

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::devSize

device size, 8-bit, 16-bit or 32-bit bus width

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::devType

device type, NAND or NOR like

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::elmBaseAddr

Error Location Module base address for ECC computation. ECC algorithm supported by the controller.

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::eventId

GPMC IP V1 Peripheral CorePac intc event ID

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::gpmcBaseAddr

GPMC IP V1 Peripheral base address.

int32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::intcMuxInEvent

interrupt controller mux input event ID. K2: CIC input event; AM: Xbar mux input event; -1: reserved for Resource Manager

int32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::intcMuxNum

interrupt controller mux number. K2: CIC number AM: Xbar instance number -1: reserved for Resource Manager

int32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::intcMuxOutEvent

interrupt controller mux output event ID. K2: host int num, output int from CIC; AM: Xbar input index; -1: reserved for Resource Manager

bool GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::intrEnable

Enable GPMC interrupt.

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::intrNum

GPMC IP V1 Peripheral CorePac interrupt vector

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::timeLatency

Current Active chip select in use by the memory controller

GPMC_v1_timingParams_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::timingParams

Structure holding the timing parameters for the device.

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::waitPinNum

Wait pin Number to which the Ready/Busy pin is connected.

uint32_t GPMC_v1_HwAttrs_s::waitPinPol

Wait pin polarity
